overview: They're back! Bad boys Matthias von Fistenberg and Tommy Hawk are back in Ipanema Heat for summer in Rio de Janeiro in which they take over a penthouse in the famous neighborhood of Ipanema. The roof deck's million-dollar view only gets better when leather-clad hunks like Andreas and Ivan whip out their huge cocks and meaty bubble asses in preparation for some raw man-on-man action. After their barebacking buddies have fun in the sun, Matthias and Tommy move inside the penthouse for some raw action of their own. If you thought it was hot in California, you've yet to feel the Ipanema Heat.
title: Ipanema Heat
